concept.name: Advisory
concept.definition: A message to customers and members, not for publication.

concept.name: Agate
concept.definition: Statistical sports and financial market data.

concept.name: Analysis
concept.definition: Stories specifically headlined "AP News Analysis" with rules already established by News.

concept.name: AP Impact
concept.definition: A story designated by a senior editor as an "AP Impact" story.

concept.name: Blog
concept.definition: Content that is presented as a web log, with content created by one or more people, usually maintained by one person. May provide commentary or news on a particular subject or may function as a more personal online diary.

concept.name: Column
concept.definition: A regular feature written by the same person or a substitute about a specific subject or topic, with or without an opinion included.

concept.name: Daybook
concept.definition: A list of upcoming events.

concept.name: Enterprise/Feature
concept.definition: An AP story or member pick-up that is not focused on a breaking news angle, but is a feature, workup or trend story.

concept.name: ExtendedHeadlinePackage
concept.definition: Long headlines with links to full text of the top stories, as chosen by editors in a particular category.

concept.name: Fixture
concept.definition: An item filed with daily, weekly or monthly regularity (for example, Farm Scene). Excludes "Columns."

concept.name: Game Story
concept.definition: Sports stories about a particular game or sporting event.

concept.name: HeadlinePackage
concept.definition: Short headlines with links to full text of the top stories, as chosen by editors in a particular category.

concept.name: Lookahead
concept.definition: A story previewing an upcoming, scheduled event.

concept.name: NewsBrief
concept.definition: The first two paragraphs and links to full text and associated photos of the top stories, as chosen by editors in a particular category.

concept.name: Obituary
concept.definition: A spot story about the death of a person.

concept.name: Poll/Survey
concept.definition: Raw data to support a poll or survey.

concept.name: Press Release
concept.definition: A text or multi-media item providing non-journalistic information to the news media from a PR, government or corporate organization.

concept.name: Profile
concept.definition: A biography of a person or a company.

concept.name: Review
concept.definition: A review of a book, play, concert or other cultural event.

concept.name: ShortNewsBrief
concept.definition: The first paragraph and links to full text and associated photos of the top stories, as chosen by editors in a particular category.

concept.name: Sidebar
concept.definition: A secondary item in support of another story offering background, secondary angles or history.

concept.name: Sports Scores
concept.definition: An item containing in-progress or end of game scoring statistical information.

concept.name: Spot Development
concept.definition: A report on an event or news item that happened today, or that we are learning about today that should be reported ASAP. As much as 90% of Associated Press content falls into this category.

concept.name: Transcript/Verbatim
concept.definition: Transcripts or excerpts.

concept.name: Weather Forecast
concept.definition: A prediction of future weather.
